00020 void ParamReader::ParseArguments(int Number, char ** Arguments) throw (ParameterException, ConnectionException) {
00021         for (int i=1; i<Number; ++i){
00022                 string CurrentArgument = Arguments[i];
00023                 if(CurrentArgument=="-time"){ // Simulation Total Time
00024                         if (i+1<Number){
00025                                 // Check if it is a number
00026                                 istringstream Argument(Arguments[++i]);
00027    
00028                                 if (!(Argument >> this->SimulationTime))
00029                                 throw ParameterException(Arguments[i], "Invalid simulation time");                              
00030                         } else {
00031                                 throw ParameterException(Arguments[i],"Invalid simulation time");                               
00032                         }
00033                 } else if (CurrentArgument=="-nf"){ // Network configuration file
00034                         if (i+1<Number){
00035                                 // Check if it is a valid file and exists
00036                                 this->NetworkFile = Arguments[++i];
00037                                 if (!this->FileExists(this->NetworkFile)){
00038                                         throw ParameterException(Arguments[i],"Invalid network configuration file. The file doesn't exist.");
00039                                 }
00040                         } else {
00041                                 throw ParameterException(Arguments[i],"Invalid network configuration file");                            
00042                         }
00043                 } else if (CurrentArgument=="-wf"){ // Weights configuration file
00044                         if (i+1<Number){
00045                                 // Check if it is a valid file and exists
00046                                 this->WeightsFile = Arguments[++i];
00047                                 if (!this->FileExists(this->WeightsFile)){
00048                                         throw ParameterException(Arguments[i],"Invalid weights configuration file. The file doesn't exist.");
00049                                 }
00050                         } else {
00051                                 throw ParameterException(Arguments[i],"Invalid weights configuration file");                            
00052                         }
00053                 } else if (CurrentArgument=="-info"){
00054                         this->NetworkInfo = true;
00055                 } else if (CurrentArgument=="-sf"){
00056                         if (i+1<Number){
00057                                 // Check if it is a valid file and exists
00058                                 this->OutputWeightDrivers.push_back(new FileOutputWeightDriver (Arguments[++i]));
00059                         }
00060                 } else if (CurrentArgument=="-wt"){
00061                         if (i+1<Number){
00062                                 // Check if it is a number
00063                                 istringstream Argument(Arguments[++i]);
00064    
00065                                 if (!(Argument >> this->WeightTime))
00066                                 throw ParameterException(Arguments[i], "Invalid saving weight step time");
00067                         } else {
00068                                 throw ParameterException(Arguments[i],"Invalid saving weight step time");                               
00069                         }
00070                 } else if (CurrentArgument=="-st"){
00071                         if (i+1<Number){
00072                                 // Check if it is a number
00073                                 istringstream Argument(Arguments[++i]);
00074    
00075                                 if (!(Argument >> this->SimulationStepTime))
00076                                 throw ParameterException(Arguments[i], "Invalid simulation step time");
00077                         } else {
00078                                 throw ParameterException(Arguments[i],"Invalid simulation step time");                          
00079                         }
00080                 } else if (CurrentArgument=="-if"){
00081                         if (i+1<Number){
00082                                 // Check if it is a valid file and exists
00083                                 string File=Arguments[++i];
00084                                 if (!this->FileExists(File)){
00085                                         throw ParameterException(File,"Invalid input file. The file doesn't exist.");
00086                                 }
00087                                 this->InputDrivers.push_back(new FileInputSpikeDriver (File.c_str()));
00088                         } else {
00089                                 throw ParameterException(Arguments[i],"Invalid input file");                            
00090                         }
00091                 } else if (CurrentArgument=="-ic"){
00092                         if (i+2<Number){
00093                                 string host = Arguments[i+1];
00094                                 string address = "";
00095                                 unsigned short port = 0;
00096                                 
00097                                 string type = Arguments[i+2];
00098                                 
00099                                 TCPIPInputSpikeDriver * Driver;
00100                                 
00101                                 if (type == string("Server")){
00102                                         istringstream ss(host);
00103                                         if (!(ss >> port)){
00104                                         throw ParameterException(Arguments[i+1], "Invalid connection port");
00105                                         }
00106                                         Driver = new TCPIPInputSpikeDriver (new ServerSocket(port));
00107                                 }else if (type == string("Client")){
00108                                         string::size_type pos = host.find(":",0);
00109                                         if ( pos != string::npos ){
00110                                                 address = host.substr(0, pos);
00111                                                 istringstream ss(host.substr(pos+1));
00112                                                 if (!(ss >> port))
00113                                                 throw ParameterException(Arguments[i+1], "Invalid connection port");
00114                                         } else {
00115                                                 // Output error
00116                                                 throw ParameterException(Arguments[i+1],"Invalid output connection. Check the address and the port.");  
00117                                         }
00118                                         Driver = new TCPIPInputSpikeDriver (new ClientSocket(address,port));
00119                                 } else {
00120                                         // Output error
00121                                         throw ParameterException(Arguments[i+2],"Invalid output connection type. Only Server and Client are allowed");
00122                                 }
00123                                 
00124                                 i += 2;
00125                                 this->InputDrivers.push_back(Driver);
00126                                 
00127                         } else {
00128                                 throw ParameterException(Arguments[i],"Invalid input connection.");
00129                         }
00130                         
00131                 } else if (CurrentArgument=="-log"){
00132                         if (i+1<Number){
00133                                 // Check if it is a valid file and exists
00134                                 this->MonitorDrivers.push_back(new FileOutputSpikeDriver (Arguments[++i]));
00135                         }
00136                 } else if (CurrentArgument=="-of"){
00137                         if (i+1<Number){
00138                                 // Check if it is a valid file and exists
00139                                 this->OutputDrivers.push_back(new FileOutputSpikeDriver (Arguments[++i]));
00140                         }
00141                 } else if (CurrentArgument=="-oc"){
00142                         if (i+2<Number){
00143                                 string host = Arguments[i+1];
00144                                 string address = "";
00145                                 unsigned short port = 0;
00146                                 
00147                                 string type = Arguments[i+2];
00148                                 
00149                                 TCPIPOutputSpikeDriver * Driver;
00150                                 
00151                                 if (type == string("Server")){
00152                                         istringstream ss(host);
00153                                         if (!(ss >> port)){
00154                                         throw ParameterException(Arguments[i], "Invalid connection port");
00155                                         }
00156                                         Driver = new TCPIPOutputSpikeDriver (new ServerSocket(port));
00157                                 }else if (type == string("Client")){
00158                                         string::size_type pos = host.find(":",0);
00159                                         if ( pos != string::npos ){
00160                                                 address = host.substr(0, pos);
00161                                                 istringstream ss(host.substr(pos+1));
00162                                                 if (!(ss >> port))
00163                                                 throw ParameterException(Arguments[i], "Invalid connection port");
00164                                         } else {
00165                                                 // Output error
00166                                                 throw ParameterException(Arguments[i],"Invalid output connection. Check the address and the port.");    
00167                                         }
00168                                         Driver = new TCPIPOutputSpikeDriver (new ClientSocket(address,port));
00169                                 } else {
00170                                         // Output error
00171                                         throw ParameterException(Arguments[i],"Invalid output connection type. Only Server and Client are allowed");
00172                                 }
00173                                 
00174                                 i += 2;
00175                                 
00176                                 this->OutputDrivers.push_back(Driver);
00177                         } else {
00178                                 throw ParameterException(Arguments[i],"Invalid output connection.");
00179                         }
00180                 } else if (CurrentArgument=="-ioc"){
00181                         if (i+2<Number){
00182                                 string host = Arguments[i+1];
00183                                 string address = "";
00184                                 unsigned short port = 0;
00185                                 
00186                                 string type = Arguments[i+2];
00187                                 
00188                                 TCPIPInputOutputSpikeDriver * Driver;
00189                                 
00190                                 if (type == string("Server")){
00191                                         istringstream ss(host);
00192                                         if (!(ss >> port)){
00193                                         throw ParameterException(Arguments[i], "Invalid connection port");
00194                                         }
00195                                         Driver = new TCPIPInputOutputSpikeDriver (new ServerSocket(port));
00196                                 }else if (type == string("Client")){
00197                                         string::size_type pos = host.find(":",0);
00198                                         if ( pos != string::npos ){
00199                                                 address = host.substr(0, pos);
00200                                                 istringstream ss(host.substr(pos+1));
00201                                                 if (!(ss >> port))
00202                                                 throw ParameterException(Arguments[i], "Invalid connection port");
00203                                         } else {
00204                                                 // Output error
00205                                                 throw ParameterException(Arguments[i],"Invalid input-output connection. Check the address and the port.");      
00206                                         }
00207                                         Driver = new TCPIPInputOutputSpikeDriver (new ClientSocket(address,port));
00208                                 } else {
00209                                         // Output error
00210                                         throw ParameterException(Arguments[i],"Invalid input-output connection type. Only Server and Client are allowed");
00211                                 }
00212                                 
00213                                 i += 2;
00214                                 
00215                                 this->InputDrivers.push_back(Driver);
00216                                 this->OutputDrivers.push_back(Driver);
00217                         } else {
00218                                 throw ParameterException(Arguments[i],"Invalid input-output connection.");
00219                         }
00220                 } else {
00221                                 throw ParameterException(Arguments[i],"Invalid parameter.");
00222                 }       
00223         }       
00224         
00225         if (this->SimulationTime==-1.0){
00226                 throw ParameterException(Arguments[0],"The simulation time isn't specified.");  
00227         } else if (this->NetworkFile==NULL){
00228                 throw ParameterException(Arguments[0],"The network configuration file isn't specified.");
00229         } else if (this->WeightsFile==NULL){
00230                 throw ParameterException(Arguments[0],"The weight configuration file isn't specified.");
00231         }
00232         
00233         return;
00234 }

00236 bool ParamReader::FileExists(string Name){
00237         bool flag = false;
00238         fstream fin;
00239         fin.open(Name.c_str(),ios::in);
00240         if ( fin.is_open() ){
00241                 flag=true;
00242         }
00243         fin.close();
00244         return flag;    
00245 }

00247 ParamReader::ParamReader(int ArgNumber, char ** Arg) throw (ParameterException, ConnectionException) :SimulationTime(-1.0), NetworkFile(NULL), WeightsFile(NULL), WeightTime(0.0), NetworkInfo(false),
00248         SimulationStepTime(0.0), InputDrivers(), OutputDrivers(), OutputWeightDrivers() {
00249         ParseArguments(ArgNumber,Arg);  
00250 }
